name: Dockhand
short_desc: Modern Docker management UI with real-time monitoring
author: Finsys
description: Dockhand is a modern Docker management application providing real-time container management, Compose stack orchestration, multi-environment support, Git integration for stack deployment, interactive terminal, log streaming, file browser, and vulnerability scanning. Features include SSO via OIDC, local user authentication, and optional role-based access control (Enterprise).
